name: Lillo Twilight
description: These slim cut pants from Fiore give you a tailored feel at a fraction of the cost. Built from space-age weaves, the Lillo are a low maintenance, high impact addition to your office wardrobe.
description_cn: 菲奥伦公司的这款修身裤让你以低价感受到量身定做的感觉.航天时代织物制成,丽络是一种维护成本低,高冲击力的办公室装饰.
